description:
Broken [2006] (based on a true story)

Capitalising on the success of films like "Saw" and "Hostel", Broken gives the survive-or-die scenario an al fresco spin. The premise is somewhat familiar; a woman is abducted and taken to a remote part of the woods, where she is subjected to unthinkable torments by her cruel and sadistic captor. Why any of this is happening is unclear, and itÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s this apparent lack of motive that heightens the tension to an almost unbearable degree. Directors Simon Boyes and Adam Mason prove that you donÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢t need a huge budget to unnerve your audience; just a creepy setting and an inventive, albeit twisted, imagination.

Rated R for strong brutal violence and torture, language and some sexuality/nudity.
